title: Patrick Lawrence: The US Doesn’t Pursue Foreign Policy, Only Security Policy
itunes:title: Patrick Lawrence: The US Doesn’t Pursue Foreign Policy, Only Security Policy
description: Patrick Lawrence, writer and executive editor of The Scrum, analyzes the roots of US foreign policy failures, how these are reflected in the current confrontation with Russia, which can be found the US establishment's weddedness to power and to an unwillingness to see the other's perspective.
